class.name: OpenXRSpatialComponentPersistenceList
class.brief_description: Object for storing the query persistence result data.
class.description: Object for storing the query persistence result data when calling [method OpenXRSpatialEntityExtension.query_snapshot].

method.name: get_persistent_state
method.description: Returns the persistent state ([code]XrSpatialPersistenceStateEXT[/code]) for the entity at this [param index].

method.name: get_persistent_uuid
method.description: Returns the persistent uuid for the entity at this [param index].
